attributes.action: Stop IR35 For Public Sector Workers During the Coronavirus Pandemic.
attributes.background: Social Workers, nurses and social sector agency workers are key workers, we are frontline and putting our health at risk for others without the protections of being a permanent employee but we are essential. We are therefore calling on the governement to cease IR35 for Social sector agency workers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300458

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
